defaultPage.description:
The initial active page when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the active page of the pagination.

defaultPageSize.description:
The initial number of data items per page when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the page size of the pagination.

getPageUrl.description:
Function to generate href attributes for pagination links.
Only used when `type` is set to "link".

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

pageSize.description: The controlled number of data items per page

siblingCount.description: Number of pages to show beside active page

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

type.description: The type of the trigger element
